
```{r}
# régression simple
dat_lm = dummy_cols(dat, select_columns = "mus2")
dat_lm$metal = dat_lm$mus2_4+dat_lm$mus2_5
mod_simple = lm(sui1 ~ metal, data = dat_lm)
summary(mod_simple)
```
